info.task: navigate from empty expanded combobox to last option in listbox popup
info.title: Navigate from an empty, expanded combobox to the last option in a listbox popup in interaction mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandCombobox
setupScript.description: sets focus on and expands the combobox

user: With focus on the combobox, navigate to the last option in the listbox popup.
instructions.raw: With focus on the combobox, navigate to the last option in the listbox popup.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Role of the popup ('listbox') is conveyed
Name of the popup ('States') is conveyed
Text of the focused option in the popup ('Wyoming') is conveyed
State of the focused option in the popup (selected) is conveyed
Position of the focused option in the popup (56) is conveyed
Number of options in the popup (56) is conveyed
